content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining and Storage System at position(41.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill mining coal at (41.0, -82.0)
- Connected to input chest at (41.5, -83.5) containing 1600 coal
- Connected to output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 800 coal
- Additional storage chest at (41.5, -84.5) containing 1600 coal

###Iron Smelting System
Components:
- Input chest for iron ore at (45.5, -84.5)
- Two stone furnaces:
  - First furnace at (45.0, -81.0) with 50 coal as fuel
  - Second furnace at (47.0, -81.0) with 49 coal as fuel
- Two burner inserters for furnace feeding:
  - First inserter at (44.5, -79.5) picking from (43.5, -79.5) and dropping to (45.5, -79.5)
  - Second inserter at (46.5, -79.5) picking from (45.5, -79.5) and dropping to (47.5, -79.5)
- Intermediate chest at (45.5, -79.5)
- Output chest at (49.5, -80.5) containing 1500 iron plates

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces
- Before placing inserters, verify the target location is clear of other entities
- Multiple attempts were made to place inserters at already occupied positions (45.5, -80.0), (45.0, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.0, -79.5)
- Consider implementing a position validation check before placement attempts

### System efficiency issues
- Coal mining system is backing up due to full chests
- Iron smelting system has no ingredients despite having infrastructure in place
- Ensure proper item flow between components by managing chest capacities and transfer rates

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity(): Places entities in the world
  - Success: Returns placed entity when position is clear
  - Failure: Throws exception when target position is occupied

Important Variables:
- first_inserter: BurnerInserter
- second_inserter: BurnerInserter
